channel.title: Every Time I Download A Client It Doesnt Work!
channel.description: I have this client called Hellzend Client[code] hellzend.co.nr[/code] And When I Compile It Compiles...But Then When I Click [code]r[/code] It Says I Need: Server.CLASS -.-....And Other Ones Say Deffernet Things I Really Need Help Plz! [img]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb215/bdraju00/bkround.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 10:14:03 AM[/size][hr]Thats The Pic i Have This thing Called: Open Source Client........And When I Put The Pic It Wont Work![br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 10:18:21 AM[/size][hr]still need help..[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 10:36:49 AM[/size][hr]Ok Ill Say PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ can u help me :(

item.title: Every Time I Download A Client It Doesnt Work!
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

QUIT FUICKING TRIPLE AND QUADRUPLE POSTING!!!

Okay… if you have a run.bat in your client, put this code in… I think you put mod taharoks perfect compiler in the compile thing… that’s for servers, not clients…

Put this in your run.bat

@echo off title Client java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI pause

Read full topic
item.source: Every Time I Download A Client It Doesnt Work!
